name: Dr. Michelle S. Thomas
what_you_do: Michelle S. Thomas is an author, entrepreneur, relationship surgeon, certified life/relationship/business coach, motivational speaker, and multiple business owner.
who_you_serve: Individuals and businesses seeking to achieve peace, prosperity, and profitability.
signature_programs: The Exceptional Woman Tour, a global bi-annual conference
business_focus: Providing empathy-driven, executable solutions to help clients conquer roadblocks and unlock their fullest potential.
service_provided: public speaking, online courses, personal/professional coaching
